channel.title: [317] Change items dropped form NPC
channel.description: Hey all, I've been looking through NPChandler for several minutes and I cant seem to find where all the drop logic is. I have OceanX which is based off of EvolutionX. Any help is appreciated, thank you!

item.title: [317] Change items dropped form NPC
item.dc:creator: @calebsomthing calebsomthing
item.description:
@calebsomthing wrote:

theres a folder or .cfg file in your source. called NPCdrops, npcdrops, Npcdrops. it might even be a .txt drop…
its kinda like a shop ina way
npc id. id of item, ammount of item droped, how much of a % chance it has to be droped.
somthing like that. GL. if u have teamviewer i can help.

Read full topic
